title: First Look: Hunt Sustain Phase One Wheels Use Recycled Carbon Fiber and Aluminum
content:
Hunt is introducing a new line of carbon and aluminum wheelsets that were developed with their environmental impact in mind. The Sustain Phase One range comprises three new wheelsets; the Phase One 42 Carbon Disc Ti, the Phase One 4 Season All-Road Disc, and the Trail Wide 29. Where possible, the rims of each of â€¦ Continued

author: Jessie-May Morgan
